page.title: 16Upton Magna village hall (2)
page.content: The village hall is open every day of the week if needed. The village hall can cater for up to 150 people with food and drinks.It has a kitchen with hot and cold water,a sink unit and a cooker.It has Ladies and Gents toilets;they have got hot and cold water in both toilets.It has a bar,a committee room and a store room.The village hall has been completely overhauled.Cooking and heating were done using coke,but this has been replaced by an electric cooker and central heating.There is a pipe which goes through the roof.There used to be a fire place but it has been knocked out.The children have dinners at school now,but in 1940 they started having dinners in the village hall.They stopped going to the village hall in 1974 because the new St. Lucias school was opened.
